name: Music Player
description: A comprehensive music playback application for NextUI featuring local file playback, internet radio streaming, and music downloading.
author: kotaksempit

changelog.v1.1.3: Fix: Wrong binary launched for tg5050.
changelog.v1.1.2: Latest NextUI v6.7.1 is required. Support for tg5050 and bug fixes
changelog.v1.1.1: Fix: Prevent downloads failing at 100% by enforcing M4A format
changelog.v1.1.0: CPU usage optimizations and minor bug fixes
